messages.subject: RE: [samuraihistory] Hello! New to the Group.
messages.msgSnippet: Hello Amy! I too am lurking. Too little to contribute at this point. Where are you practicing Kyuudo and in which Ryu? I plan to purchase a nice Take-yumi once
messages.messageBody:
Hello Amy!

I too am lurking. Too little to contribute at this point. Where are you
practicing Kyuudo and in which Ryu? I plan to purchase a nice Take-yumi once
I am ready to make the jump from a 20 kilo to a 23 (and of course after I
save up the money).

M.J.Peters
